doc.description:
Model View Controller Class


This class will route a request to the according model and/or view through its controller.
A model and a view can be automatically associated if located in the same directory branch with the same name than the controller in their respective locations
A view can be directly imported in the controller through this very class

tags.author: Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
tags.todo: Look into the check function and divide it

name: bbn\Mvc\Model

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: Models are always recreated and reincluded, even if they have from the same path
__construct.description: They are all created from bbn\Mvc::get_model

description_parts.content: They are all created from bbn\Mvc::get_model

doc.description: Constructor.

arguments.name: db
arguments.description: The database object in the first call and the controller path in the calls within the class (through Add)(e.g books/466565 or html/home)

arguments.name: info
arguments.description: The full path to the model's file

doc.description:
Models are always recreated and reincluded, even if they have from the same path
They are all created from bbn\Mvc::get_model

__construct.comments: /** * Models are always recreated and reincluded, even if they have from the same path * They are all created from bbn\Mvc::get_model * * @param null|Db $db The database object in the first call and the controller path in the calls within the class (through Add)(e.g books/466565 or html/home) * @param array $info The full path to the model's file * @param Controller $ctrl The parent controller * @param Mvc $mvc The parent MVC * @throws \Exception */

The controller instance requesting the model
The path as being requested
Included files

The plugin name.
The database connection instance
The data model
An external object that can be filled after the object creation and can be used as a global with the function add_inc
The MVC class from which the controller is called

dummyComments:
/**
 * Model View Controller Class
 *
 *
 * This class will route a request to the according model and/or view through its controller.
 * A model and a view can be automatically associated if located in the same directory branch with the same name than the controller in their respective locations
 * A view can be directly imported in the controller through this very class
 *
 * @author Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
 * @copyright BBN Solutions
 * @since Apr 4, 2011, 23:23:55 +0000
 * @category  MVC
 * @license   http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT
 * @version 0.2r89
 * @todo Merge the output objects and combine JS strings.
 * @todo Stop to rely only on sqlite and offer file-based or any db-based solution.
 * @todo Look into the check function and divide it
 */
description:
This class will route a request to the according model and/or view through its controller.
A model and a view can be automatically associated if located in the same directory branch with the same name than the controller in their respective locations
A view can be directly imported in the controller through this very class
